response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's valued at $150 by me. Considering its worth to you might be around $100, I propose we find a mutually beneficial price. Would you be interested in discussing this further? If not, please let me know so I can extend the opportunity to another interested party, John, who is willing to purchase it for $150.", "product_price": 150}
